title: MISLEADING PERKS FOR PREMIUM ACCOUNT
text:
I am writing this review to express my profound disappointment with Revolut's travel insurance service. Initially attracted by the promise of amazing perks for trip cancellation coverage, my experience with the claims process has been far from satisfactory.

I filed a claim last May, and despite assurances that all required documents were received and the claim was filed, I have yet to receive any updates or a claim number. The communication channels provided for additional information, including email and phone, have proven to be unresponsive. This lack of communication has left me in the dark about the status of my claim, causing considerable frustration and inconvenience.

Adding to the frustration is the ineffective assistance from Revolut's support team. Despite numerous attempts through calls and emails, I have not received any resolution or meaningful information about the progress of my claim. The disparity between the advertised benefits of their travel insurance and the actual customer service experience has left me deeply dissatisfied.

I hope this review serves as constructive feedback for Revolut to reevaluate and enhance its customer service and claims handling processes. Based on my regrettable experience, I would caution potential customers to approach Revolut's travel insurance service with skepticism and consider alternatives with more reliable support.

title: Would give no stars if I could
text: Do not recommend getting this card. I had a fraudulent purchase and they told me there is nothing they can do. I told them within minutes of the charge being made and it was still pending. DO NOT GET THIS CARD!

title: Good service, great app
text: After using the crappy app from my traditional bank for so long, this is a breath of fresh air. The metal upgrade is worth it if you travel.

title: Transfers not instant like other banks
text: Do not depend on this app for instant transfers as is common in the UK among all other banks. It will cause you to be in an awkward situation when trying to do any money transfers.

title: ILLEGAL NOT FDIC INSURED PSEUDO BANK
text: Have been with this app for almost a decade and it’s now become a fraudulent liability to my life. It started off as a wonderful banking platform but over the years have discovered their money laundering and illegal operations which they try to hide behind with their FDIC false advertisement/claim  on their website. They are a client of Metropolitan Commercial Bank based out NYC but doesn’t operate on any of their FDIC regulations. Including holding direct deposits and payroll funds longer than legally allowed by Regulation CC. I’m filing legal action against this tech company fronting as a bank.

title: What is next?
text: Thanks for the app os working great so far … when are we going to have the option to buy stocks from United States companies like Royal Caribbean etc ?

title: Fraudulent Charges
text: They fraudulently charged my account $34 and previously attempted to charge me $80+ however I have never had a Revolut account. My bank noticed the $80+ charge and declined it, however now I have to call in order to fix this $34 charge. Scammers. This is thievery.

title: One of the best…sad to go!
text:
It was one of the best apps I have used. 
As of January people who are from French Polynesia (part of the EU) will no longer be able to use Revolut. Looking for a new app that provides services like Revolut.

title: Terrible App
text: So much of this app just doesn’t work. Verification of a new card, bank transfers, paying a friend. It took multiple attempts using different parts of the app, to just upload money and send it. Login and password recovery was also bad, asking for ID. If you want something easy to use, look elsewhere.

title: Unsolicited notifications
text: They send useless promotional notifications I never asked for and you can’t deactivate them.

title: Annoying and time wasting signup
text: I tried to sign up with my PC, but the email code was taking too long to get into my Outlook email.  So I tried “choose another method” that gives a QR Code.  The QR Code used with my phone takes me to the start screen of the Revolut App!!!  Also I appear to be locked into 4x arbitrary currencies (Hong Kong Dollars, Turkish Lira, Mexican Peso and one other) for finding accounts - I am certainly not going to find my account with arbitrary currencies.  When I tried to link a Revolut Business subsidiary funding account, this was denied.  This is just too annoying for words……

title: Revolut USA no good
text: I have used Revolut for many years in the UK and New Zealand. I have just moved to America and was looking forward to getting my Revolut USA account. Every other banking institute that is FCA accepts these documents. Not happy. Loosing a loyal customer at no fault of mine.

title: Used by scammers
text: This app is used by scammers and if you are charged, Revolut will not stop and reverse the charge/transfer and call it chargeback invalid. This may work for others, but just know, once you send money, there is no way to get it back.

title: Requests expire! And Revolut doesn’t keep track!
text:
Imagine this… you use Revolut everyday in your household, with friends or for business. One day you make a money ‘request’ and wait for the money. If the sender can’t send right away or forgets, 10 days later Revolut erases completely the requests from the feed and only sends a notification that disappears. What is the ‘requester’ doesn’t see that notification and doesn’t know about the 10 day expiry. Then that request is gone FOREVER! It can be hard to track down or remember every money request. 

Now, I have no clue how long this has been going on, years for me probably. I’m sure a few requests will never be paid or remembered. 

Had a chat with customer support today. No help whatsoever. Solution for Revolut: simple, just add a tab for ‘expired requests’. Come on Revolut, you can do better than that.

Why there are no other options other than BTC??? 

Extremely disappointing app

title: It’s a Clown Show
text: Anybody who takes their banking seriously do not come here. The things that these people do would never be permitted in any branch location bank. I had an unusual circumstance with a few charges that I needed to dispute. I went out of my way to make sure to ask all the questions I could and get all the information I could before filing the dispute. THEY GAVE ME WRONG ADVICE!! Because of the advice they gave me about which category to file it under, the disputes were not even considered. I got an email stating that if I reached out to Chat Support I could review the evidence that they used to come to this determination.. yeah, that doesn’t happen. These people have no idea what they’re doing. after this, my account became frozen in which they didn’t even tell me I had to discover this, and will not provide me a reason why. don’t put your money here. These people take no responsibility and anything they do. I’ve actually been lied to misinformed and not help at all with any of my issues here. here’s an update these people are full of bull…They don’t wanna speak to me about these issues. They’ve closed my account because of them.
